nodes.text: Lake-divers were creatures found on the world of Pondakree. They were particularly easy to capture, and when Pondakree native Emarr Ottkreg witnessed the Galactic Empire destroy several Alliance to Restore the Republic starships with ease at the Battle of Endor he compared difficulty to catching lake-divers.
Lake-divers were first mentioned in the short story "The Levers of Power", which was written by Jason Fry and released in 2015 as part of the The Rise of the Empire book of collected stories.
